title: Of Mist and Shadow
description: A medieval adventure filled with noble hearts, dark deeds, and a love too deep to be denied... Gwendolyn Greyson's life is about to change in unimaginable ways. Her beloved father has recently died, and rebel knights threaten her home. Into this confusion rides the dashing Aidan Blakeslee, who informs her that, by order of the king, her land now belongs to him. England is in great turmoil, and the king has gifted Aidan Blakeslee, his most able and trusted knight, with the small estate of Lockshire to root out rebel spies. With their fates joined, Aidan and Gwen will face danger at every turn as past rivalries turn deadly, and Gwen will discover that the true threat Aidan poses is not to her property but to her heart.
author: Lu Erickson
